trans-unit.source: Binds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand" /> (or another <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ICommand" /> implementation).
A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> associates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> asocia un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> implementación.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> is the primary implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interface for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commanding system.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> es la implementación principal de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> interfaz para el [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] sistema de comandos.

trans-unit.source: In general, when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is executed, the command is invoked, although the command behavior is further influenced by command-specific factors such as the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: En general, cuando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> es ejecuta, se invoca el comando, aunque el comportamiento del comando adicional depende de factores específicos del comando como el <xref:System.Windows.Input.CanExecuteRoutedEventArgs.CanExecute%2A> valor.

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre los comandos, consulte el [Introducción estableciendo](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: When defining a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], there are two ways to specify the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Al definir un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], hay dos maneras de especificar el <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The first way to establish a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element, which enables a syntax to specify mouse actions and modifiers as a single string; for example, "CTRL+LeftClick".
trans-unit.target: La primera forma de establecer un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] consiste en definir el <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> atributo de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento, que permite utilizar una sintaxis especificar acciones del mouse y modificadores como una sola cadena; por ejemplo, "CTRL + hacer".

trans-unit.source: The second way is to define the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> attribute of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> element.
trans-unit.target: La segunda manera consiste en definir el <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> atributo de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Both ways of setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> are equivalent and modify the same underlying object, but there will be a conflict if both are used.
trans-unit.target: Ambos modos de configuración de la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> son equivalentes y modifican el mismo objeto subyacente, pero habrá un conflicto si se usan.

trans-unit.source: In the case when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> attributes are both set, the gesture is invalid.
trans-unit.target: En el caso cuando la <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture%2A> atributos se establecen, el movimiento no es válido.

trans-unit.source: In general, it is recommended that you use only the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> attribute from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], even if you do not specify modifiers; this avoids ambiguity, provides the most streamlined syntax, and provides the most straightforward representation for serialization.
trans-unit.target: En general, se recomienda usar solo el <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding.Gesture%2A> de atributo de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], incluso si no se especifican modificadores; Esto evita la ambigüedad, proporciona la sintaxis más sencilla y proporciona la representación más sencilla para la serialización.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> pueden definirse en un objeto específico o en el nivel de clase registrando un <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.RegisterClassInputBinding%2A> en la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> clase.

trans-unit.source: The most typical way to define a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> is within the control template, setting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] by declaring one or more <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> or <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elements.
trans-unit.target: La forma más habitual de definir un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> está dentro de la plantilla de control, estableciendo la <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A> propiedad en [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] mediante la declaración de uno o varios <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> o <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> elementos.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding> para enlazar un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> a una <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class.
The command associated with the gesture.
The gesture associated with the command.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" /> class, using the specified command and mouse gesture.
The following example shows how to bind an <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> using a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo enlazar un <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> con un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The object to clone.
Copies the base (non-animated) values of the properties of the specified object.
The object to clone.
Copies the current values of the properties of the specified object.
Creates an instance of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
The new object.
Gets or sets the gesture associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
The gesture.
trans-unit.target: El movimiento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> with or without a set of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> es un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> con o sin un conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to have a modifier key associated with it.
trans-unit.target: A diferencia de un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> no es necesario tener una tecla modificadora asociada a él.

trans-unit.source: The following example show how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear un enlace entre un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> a una <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.Gesture" /> is set to <see langword="null" />.
The object to clone.
Creates the instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" /> by using base (non-animated) property values.
The object to clone.
Creates the current instance a frozen clone of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Freezable" />.
If the object has animated dependency properties, their current animated values are copied.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction" /> associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding" />.
The mouse action.
trans-unit.target: La acción del mouse.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.
trans-unit.target: De manera predeterminada, es <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.None" />.

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> does not need to be associated with a modifier key.
trans-unit.target: A diferencia de un <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture>, un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> no debe asociarse con una tecla modificadora.

trans-unit.source: So a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> by itself, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, can be a valid <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.
trans-unit.target: Por lo tanto un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> por sí mismo, como <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.MiddleClick>, puede ser un tipo válido <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a binding between a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> and a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo crear un enlace entre un <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> y <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding.MouseAction" /> dependency property.
